name: unexpected-image
description: Image metadata plugin for the Unexpected assertion library

scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true) && npm run generate-site
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover --report text --report lcov _mocha -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.generate-site: node ./generate-site.js && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/string/to-have-metadata-satisfying/

author: Andreas Lind <andreas@one.com>
